tp.pr5.view.console

Class ConsoleView

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.view.console.ConsoleView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InventoryObserver, NavigationObserver, ObserverInterface, RobotEngineObserver

    public class ConsoleView
extends java.lang.Object
implements RobotEngineObserver, NavigationObserver, InventoryObserver
    The view that displays the application on console.
    It implements all the observer interfaces in order to be notified about every event that occur when the robot is running.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste
